backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing authorization and CRUD operations for products, customers, bills, expenses, and user profiles using map-based storage.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React files detailing functionality and UI behavior.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for Android build artifacts, IDE files, logs, and temporary files.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Gradle config defining app metadata, build types, dependencies, and a validation task blocking release builds with invalid PWA URLs.
frontend/android/app/proguard-rules.pro: ProGuard rules preserving WebView, Kotlin metadata, and wrapper classes for release builds.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Android manifest configuring permissions, app metadata, MainActivity, and deep linking support.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/f: MainActivity hosting a configured fullscreen WebView that loads the PWA, manages navigation, and handles external links.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Round adaptive launcher icon definition using the same assets as the standard icon.
Adaptive icon definition referencing launcher background and foreground assets.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Color resource defining the launcher background color.
String resources including app name, error messages, and the configured PWA URL required for release builds.
Defines base and fullscreen Android themes and a background color.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top-level Gradle config setting Kotlin version, repositories, and build plugins.
frontend/android/dist/.gitkeep: Empty placeholder file to keep dist directory in version control.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Project-wide Gradle settings including JVM args, AndroidX flags, Kotlin style, and R8 mode.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Configures Gradle wrapper distribution and storage paths.
frontend/android/README.md: Documentation for the Android WebView wrapper explaining configuration, build requirements, and PWA URL setup.
frontend/android/scripts/build-release-a: Script that builds a release APK, validates config, stages output, and writes metadata.
frontend/android/scripts/publish-release: Script that publishes a built APK, generates metadata, and prepares for external upload.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Configures plugin and dependency repositories and includes the app module.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry for the PWA with service worker registration and app bootstrap.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, and icons.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling caching, updates, and offline support with network-first logic.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing auth state, profile loading, and screen routing.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing navigation, top bar, content area, and footer.
Displays a startup error message with details and offers retry or cache-clearing options.
frontend/src/components/CustomerDialog.t: Provides a dialog for creating or editing customers, handling validation, offline queueing, and form state.
frontend/src/components/ProductDialog.ts: Dialog for adding or editing products with validation, inventory unit handling, and offline queue integration.
frontend/src/components/RootErrorBoundar: A global error boundary that catches rendering errors and shows a recovery UI with reload and reset options.
frontend/src/components/SideNav.tsx: Renders the side navigation menu and persists the last selected screen in local storage.
frontend/src/components/SyncIndicator.ts: Shows online/offline status, pending sync actions, and retry options for sync errors.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: Top navigation bar showing sync status, PWA install prompt, user info, and logout controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, including creating AuthClient, loading stored identities, and controlling login state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Tracks PWA installability state and provides a function to trigger the installation prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, products, customers, and related backend entities through an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme variables, and applies specific styling overrides for Radix UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/offline/storage.ts: Implements localStorage-backed caching and a queued action system for offline persistence and retries.
frontend/src/offline/useOfflineQueue.ts: Provides a hook to queue or immediately execute actions, storing failures for later retry.
frontend/src/offline/useSyncStatus.ts: Tracks online state and processes queued offline actions, syncing them via the actor and refreshing queries.
frontend/src/screens/BillingScreen.tsx: A billing interface that manages customers, products, bill lines, totals, GST, and bill creation with inventory checks and offline queue support.
frontend/src/screens/CreditsScreen.tsx: Displays credit summaries per customer using bill data, including pending status and an overall credit overview.
frontend/src/screens/CustomersScreen.tsx: Lists customers with add, edit, and delete actions, using dialogs, offline queueing, and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx: Shows high-level stats for products, customers, bills, and credits, along with sync status and recent activity counts.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Handles login via Internet Identity and optional profile setup with name and role selection.
frontend/src/screens/ProductsScreen.tsx: Displays a product list with add, edit, and delete actions, using offline queueing and dialogs.
frontend/src/screens/ReportsScreen.tsx: Generates sales, expense, and profit reports with date filtering and expense creation via offline queue.
frontend/src/utils/billingTotals.ts: Provides functions to calculate billing totals including GST and compute totals for stored bills.
frontend/src/utils/printInvoice.ts: Builds and prints an invoice by consolidating line items and formatting totals into an HTML template.
frontend/src/utils/reporting.ts: Implements daily sales, date-range summaries, and profit calculations using bill, product, and expense data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for navigation and state persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theming with OKLCH-based colors, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the current PWA priorities, architecture notes, known issues, and a list of existing implemented features with metadata.
